entry.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18683)
entry.content:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

entry.content:

Wondering how to opt your kid/family out of the state test? Denver Black Educators Caucus has created easy to follow instructions just for you! If you have questions please reach out. It cannot be used against them in case you're wondering...

entry.title: Our BLM Philly sibling needs support making a safe landing space...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Our BLM Philly sibling needs support making a safe landing space for Philly organizers a reality.
Please donate and share!
#WeKeepUsSafe #Reparations #MutualAid

Denzel Caldwell

Please help my comrade

YahN√© Ndgo is an organizer with BLM Philly and the Black Alliance for Peace. She is a fighter whose driving force is love, and this space... is one way she seeks to embody her belief that care must be a key part of our revolution. Please support this effort. Her cashapp, venmo and paypal details are included in the graphic. Send funds and share.

Paypal: paypal.me/yahnendgo

Cashapp: $yahnendgo

Venmo: @yahnedgo

entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

THIS WEEK! February 21 - 28 & All Year Long!
Take a walk through the rich history of Denver as you stroll the Welton Corridor and celebrate the Black history of Five Points. Visit historic buildings, learn about the pioneers of our neighborhood, take in mural art, and celebrate all that Five Points stands for.

entry.title: #JusticeForElijahMcClain
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#JusticeForElijahMcClain

Candice Bailey

157 pages of someone else saying that policy needs to be changed.
Aurora has wasted time and money on a private investigation that impacts absolutely NOTHING.
ELIJAH MCCLAIN WAS MURDERED.
PERFORMATIVE ACTION WILL NOT SERVE AS JUSTICE FOR MURDER.

entry.title: A spokesperson for a local Black Lives Matter group said the new...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

A spokesperson for a local Black Lives Matter group said the new report confirmed that McClain should never have been confronted by police in the first place.

"Results from the independent investigation in the murder of Elijah further supports what his family and community already knew," said Apryl Alexander, a community organizer and spokesperson for BLM 5280. "He was a young man trying to walk home and confronted without cause. Instead of simply talking to Elijah, physical force was used within 10 seconds‚Äînot enough time for him to even explain that he was going home. Criminalizing Black people for living their lives needs to end."

Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.

buzzfeednews.com

Police Had No Reason To Stop Elijah McClain, An Independent Report Found

Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.

entry.title: Under Senate Bill 31, law enforcement wouldn‚Äôt be allowed to...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Under Senate Bill 31, law enforcement wouldn‚Äôt be allowed to break up a demonstration unless there was an imminent threat of violence or significant property damage from ‚Äúa significant number or percentage of persons acting in concert‚Äù

Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a ‚Äúsignificant‚Äù number of people acting in unison,‚Ä¶

coloradosun.com

Colorado lawmakers may change when police can intervene in a protest after summer of unrest

Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a ‚Äúsignificant‚Äù number of people acting in unison,‚Ä¶Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a ‚Äúsignificant‚Äù number of people acting in unison,‚Ä¶

entry.title: Tamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Tamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a community staple for DC‚Äôs Trans community. Since September 2019, Tamika has been renting and managing a safe house as part of No Justice No Pride‚Äôs Collective housing program. Started by No Justice No Pride in 2018 NJNP Collective Housing has been a vital resource to DC's Trans & Queer Community and the larger Sex Worker Activist network within the DC Area. Since 2018 NJNP‚Äôs houses have grown to be one of the larg...est resources of LGBT housing in the city and the only organizations in the Washington DC Metro area providing dedicated housing support to Black and Brown Transgender adults over the age of 24. Tamika manages one of three NJNP houses that are being listed for sale, one after another; by the property owner SK Properties.

#BlackTransLivesMatter #EvictionDefense #MutualAid #WeKeepUsSafe

See MoreTamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a community staple for D‚Ä¶ Emmelia Ruiz Talarico needs your support for Help us buy Tamika's home!

gofundme.com

Help us buy Tamika's home!, organized by Emmelia Ruiz Talarico

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
